title: Become A Donor
description: Whole blood donation is the most common type of blood donation. During this donation, you donate about a pint (about half a liter) of whole blood

title: Why Give Blood ?
description: If you donate blood, it will be given to someone who needs it through a transfusion. Transfusions help replace blood that is lost due to surgery or injury.
